EngageManifest.Title: Nebula Rotator
EngageManifest.Description:
Displays the slide's content (image) at 950px wide by 194px tall.

This template features image content displayed in a grey frame with Slide title and description to the lower left, and pagers at the lower right.

This template is designed especially for Engage:Nebula, but can be used with any skin. The template was designed with fixed dimensions intentially; to change the dimensions of the template, simply open up the style.css and alter away!
